long_description: The Sunday Afternoons Sun Guide cap includes a cape to shade your neck on summertime adventures in the mountains and on the water. Lightweight polyester fabric has a UPF 50+ rating for excellent protection against harmful ultravioloet rays. Detachable 9.5-in.-long cape can be worn in front or back to shade your face or neck; includes a vent to allow airflow. 3.25-in.-long brim folds in half so you can easily stuff the hat in a pocket. Flip up the crown panels to cool your head off on hot days. Sunday Afternoons Sun Guide cap has a webbing/elastic tension system to ensure a good fit.
